sentences.sContent: They lurk on the kitchen sponge, your computer keyboard and the dirty laundry.
sentences.sContent_eng: They lurk on the kitchen sponge, your computer keyboard and the dirty laundry.
sentences.sCn: 它们潜伏在厨房的洗碗布上、你的电脑键盘和脏衣服上。

sentences.sContent: We still dwell in the Valley of the Shadow, lurk in its desolate places, peering from brambles and thickets at its mad, malign inhabitants.
sentences.sContent_eng: We still dwell in the Valley of the Shadow, lurk in its desolate places, peering from brambles and thickets at its mad, malign inhabitants.
sentences.sCn: 我们依旧在影子的峡谷里生存，埋伏在荒凉的地方，从荆棘和丛林中凝视着，去诽谤那里的居民。

remMethod.val: 为捉一只云雀(lark)埋伏(lurk)在小树林里
